# My project!


## Engaging Rehabilitation
Some projects that I have partake in includes the design of a therapeutical pet robot. I have also worked on a project that involves the integration of fundamental Artificial Intelligence, Internet of Things, and Microcontroller to existing rehabilitative technology for elderly undergoing physical and cognitive therapy.

You can read more about my project here: [Engaging Rehabilitation](https://www.sp.edu.sg/engineering-cluster/eee/spii-showcase/engineering-show-2021/engaging-rehabilitation){target="_blank}

## Mapletree Challenge 2024

![Picture of me presenting](imgs/present.jpg)

With the theme for Mapletree Challenge 2024 - Sustainability and Innovation, participants can look forward to an exciting line-up of pre-challenge activities, such as business proposition and financial literacy workshops, field trips to solar farms and NParks, and an entrepreneurship forum to prepare them for the Challenge.

The Challenge aims to cultivate:
- innovation
- sustainability
- technology
- entrepreneurship

You can read more about my project here: [Mapletree Challenge 2024](https://www.singaporetech.edu.sg/news/mapletree-empowers-aspiring-innovators-fifth-year-support-mapletree-challenge){target="_blank}
